entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to 7 this evening then steady. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Periods of rain beginning before morning. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to 7 this evening then steady. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
